game.name: Cartoon Stunt Car
game.description:
Do you think that you are a racing pro? Is performing the insane stunts your favorite activity? If so, Cartoon Stunt Car can be the best thing to try during your free hours. Not everyone dares to accept this challenge as you cannot complete its level without putting your driving skills to the test. Make sure to focus on the screen to complete each level in this brand new racing game. Play solo or invite your friends and compete against them in 2 player mode!

Completing each level successfully will reward you with some money through which you can upgrade your car and make your gameplay more interesting and challenging. Complete all of the 8 levels to unlock all 9 vehicles in this one of the best HTML5 car games for boys! Remember you have to complete your missions in each level before the time runs out. Track your level and time by keeping your eyes at the top right corner of the screen!

You can also track how much race you have to complete by looking at the right corner of the screen. Perform as many stunts as you can to prove yourself as the best stunt man of the city in this cool car driving simulator! This new car game features realistic in-game physics and cartoon-style graphics combined with simple controls, and seamless gameplay.
